amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit any funds under the bill from being used to discriminate against, denigrate, or otherwise undermine the religious or moral beliefs of juveniles who participate in juvenile justice programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 30 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to prohibit any funding to be used to discriminate against, denigrate, or otherwise undermine the religious or moral beliefs of juveniles who participate in juvenile justice programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Souder amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 216 (Roll no. 223).
